isis.stitle: TSI 02-12-15 - Under Valve Cover (UVC) Harness Retainer Clip Service Kit

subjectgroup.subject: Under Valve Cover (UVC) Harness Retainer Clip Service Kit

figure.caption: Figure 1. UVC Harness Retainer Clip Service Kit

note.para: The kit contains three retainer clips, but only two are required per engine. The third retainer clip is provided as an extra.

caution.para: If a retainer clip is dropped inside the engine, it must be found and removed. Otherwise, engine damage will result.

geninfo.para: A new under valve cover (UVC) wiring harness retainer clip service kit for T 444E engines (S/N 7.4HM2U0661894 and up) has been released (P/N 1844193C91). The new retainer clip is designed to ensure the electrical connection between the UVC wiring harness and the valve cover gasket.
